alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 21 at 1:53AM MST until March 22 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST /NOON MDT/ THIS MORNING TO NOON MST /1 PM MDT/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph, with gusts from 45 to 55 mph. * WHERE...The Mogollon Rim east of Flagstaff, the White Mountains and the Little Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...From 11 AM MST /noon MDT/ this morning to noon MST /1 PM MDT/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; White Mountains
